TopicTitle: [WIP] Nova's Plernets, a Kopernicus mod dev thread- Stockalike GP2 and GP3!

Articles.Content:
![8Oqdpiq.png](http://i.imgur.com/8Oqdpiq.png)

Fun Fact: the semi-famous planet mod Asclepius first appeared in this thread!

Hello! This is my first mod, and so be patient, it might take a while for me to get it right.

There are a lot of mods that add some form of Gas Planet 2, but none really add the original planet that NovaSilisko was planning to make. It sounds like the kind of thing that you try to add in before the game is released, so it seems that Gas Planet 2 will probably not ever happen. ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif) But that's okay, because now (or soon at least ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)) there's a mod for it! Here is an image of it in the tracking station, named "Meander", Jool's original name:

![2tkwEDD.png](http://i.imgur.com/2tkwEDD.png)

**CONTRIBUTORS** (so far)**:**

[_Augustus_](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/118256-_Augustus_): Helped with Kopernicus configs and names

[Interplanet Janet](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/149915-Interplanet-Janet): Helped with names

[StarCrusher96](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/152005-StarCrusher96): Agreed to help with color and height maps

**CHECKLIST** (In order of when I'll do them)**:**

- GP2 (Meander)

- move Eeloo

- Daphy (Fluff)

- Potatus (Squash)

- new Vall

- Fonso (Bunt)

- WIP release 1

- Gas Planet 3 (Egar)

- new Tylo

- Ringed moon (Bore, old Tylo)

- WIP release 2

- Volcanoes on Laythe (I actually have an idea how I'm going to do this)

- Geysers on Eeloo (Unlike Laythe, I have no idea how I'll do this)

- RELEASE!!!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-27T20:26:30Z" title="10/27/2015 08:26  PM" data-short="8 yr">October 27, 2015</time> by ThatGuyWithALongUsername**
I would change the names.
Well, I'm not very good at making my own names, so they're staying like this for now. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Other people use the planet names Harvest, Daphy, Potatus, and Fonso.
Good point. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif) Now I need names! Is anyone good at making sufficiently kerbal planet names?

Some WIP names.

Daphy = Pillow (or something like that)

Potatus = Squash

Fonso = Blunt (I'm thinking of kinda blunt mountains for this)

Ringed GP3 moon = Bore (because Tylo is boring)
Change Blunt to Bunt!

Yes, good idea, very kerbal. Reposted because I accidentally deleted the original post.

- - - Updated - - -

I also don't like "Pillow" very much. Not very kerbal. Any ideas?
How about "Fluf"?
Yeah, Fluf would work. Maybe just "Fluff", though.
Yeah, that's fine.

I think Meander itself is pretty much done for now. Here are its stats:

![yZrVebW.png](http://i.imgur.com/yZrVebW.png)

And yes, I did change the gravity to 1.2 gees. It's clearly edited. I also basically just made a bunch of tweaks to Bastion, the example gas giant in Kopernicus. It still uses the ring texture from the examples, since I have no idea how to make my own. (Oh gosh, I'll have to do normals...) Oh well, I won't get sued until I release it.

> 
> I think Meander itself is pretty much done for now. Here are its stats:
> [http://i.imgur.com/yZrVebW.png](http://i.imgur.com/yZrVebW.png)

It still uses the ring texture from the examples, since I have no idea how to make my own. (Oh gosh, I'll have to do normals...) Oh well, I won't get sued until I release it.

It's cool that you're (nearly done) with the planet! And that's a nice little amount of G's.

If you want a ring texture, I've got one here; [http://imgur.com/N2bvNa4](http://imgur.com/N2bvNa4)

You may want to rename it, though. Maybe... Meander\_ring or something.
